page.title: Microsoft Warns Asian Governments of Linux Suits
page.text: SINGAPORE (Reuters) - Microsoft Corp. <A HREF="http://www.reuters.co.uk/financeQuoteLookup.jhtml?ticker=MSFT.O qtype=sym infotype=info qcat=news">MSFT.O</A> warned Asian governments on Thursday they could face patent lawsuits for using the Linux operating system instead of its Windows software.
